title: Did the Process Really Lead the Sixers to â€¦ This? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by Ben Detrick from Cookies Hoops to talk about the state of the Philadelphia 76ers and their concerns about the team's future. They wrap everything up by discussing Ben's new book, 'The Joy of Basketball.' (36:51)
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Guest: Ben Detrick
Production Assistant: Chris Sutton
